rows.label: tlk41100152_02_msg0001
rows.name:
I hope my older brother'sokay. Really
hope he's not feeling lonely
or homesick or anything...

rows.label: tlk41100152_02_msg0002
rows.name:
It's been like this ever since Da
went away.

rows.label: tlk41100152_02_msg0003
rows.name:
It's kind of sad, but it means I have
to look after Morike now.

rows.label: tlk41100152_02_msg0004
rows.name:
I'll follow in my brother's footsteps
and study to become a Driver!
